## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G08415](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G08415)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LIP1, LIP1</u>
- **Gene Name:** lipoyl synthase 1, LOST IN POLLEN TUBE GUIDANCE 1
- **Description:**   Radical SAM superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:505006586
